articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Ten newborns killed in north India hospital fire - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The babies died from burns and suffocation after a blaze swept through a neonatal intensive care unit in Jhansi.
articles.content:
A fire ripped through the neonatal unit of a hospital in northern India, killing 10 newborns and injuring 17, the authorities said.
Emergency responders rescued 38 newborns from the ward, which hous… [+3327 chars]
